name: Arshad Hussain
company_address: Balaji Towers, 4th Floor, Banjara Hills Road #13, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500034
my_business: CEO of Jobskey Consultancy, but I prefer to be referred as recruiter or Headhunter
top_product: IT Talents (entry to senior level) Executive Search (CXO Positions) Mass Recruitment
ideal_referral: Company that is actively hiring and has a strong need for the types of candidates that Jobskey specializes in IT and trending technologies Additionally, the company should be open to working with external recruiters and have a clear understanding of the recruiting process.
top_problem_solved: Turning the Impossible into Delivered At Jobskey, we don’t just recruit — we design hiring programs tailored to the exact needs of our clients, wherever they are in the world. One of our clients presented us with a challenge that most would shy away from. They needed an experienced SAP Consultant based in South Africa — urgently. The catch? I was managing the entire operation remotely from Saudi Arabia. No local team on ground. No pre-existing pipeline in that region. Just a clear need and a trusted promise. Instead of saying "no," I said, "let’s get it done." We activated our global sourcing strategies, tapped into international networks, ran deep technical assessments, and ensured local compliance — all while maintaining daily coordination across continents. In less than 3 weeks, we successfully identified, vetted, and placed a qualified SAP Consultant in South Africa, fully aligned with the client’s expectations. The project was launched on time and ran seamlessly. For many, it was an “impossible” scenario. But at Jobskey, we believe anything that requires talent is worth going the extra mile for — regardless of location, complexity, or time zones. This experience reminded me: we’re not just solving recruitment problems — we’re building bridges across borders to help businesses succeed.
my_favourite_bni_story: From a Casual 1-2-1 to a Consistent Referral Partner One of my most memorable experiences in BNI began during a 1-2-1 conclave where I met a cross-chapter member from the construction industry. At first glance, I didn’t think we had much in common professionally. But the vibe was great, and we had a meaningful conversation — both during the conclave and in the follow-up 1-2-1. To be honest, I never expected this interaction to lead to anything more than a pleasant exchange. But BNI has its own magic. A few weeks later, he referred me to one of his contacts. That contact, in turn, introduced me to another — and that’s where the real opportunity began. I successfully closed a recruitment assignment, and that connection turned into a long-standing client. Since then — for over a year now — that BNI member continues to refer me business, both from his own company and from his personal network. What started as an unexpected connection has now become a consistent source of referrals and growth. This is the true power of BNI: business often comes from the least expected sources — if we show up, build trust, and nurture relationships

my_business:
Fragrance on Flame is a modern, eco-conscious brand dedicated to enhancing everyday spaces through the power of natural scent. We specialize in handcrafted eco-friendly candles, car fragrances, room mists, and artisan soaps, all made with clean ingredients and sustainable practices. Our products are designed to bring comfort, elegance, and wellness to your life — whether you're relaxing at home, on the road, or treating your skin with care.
We believe in mindful luxury — where every flame flickers with purpose, every fragrance uplifts the spirit, and every product honors the earth.
top_product: Our eco-friendly candles are the heart and soul of Fragrance on Flame. Made with natural soy wax, cotton wicks, and essential oil-based fragrances, they provide a clean burn, long-lasting scent, and a calming atmosphere. Whether you're unwinding at home or gifting a loved one, these candles represent the perfect blend of sustainability and luxury, making them a top favorite among our customers.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is someone who values eco-conscious living, natural products, and wellness. This could include individuals or businesses who are passionate about sustainability, home decor, self-care, or luxury gifts. Whether they’re looking for a thoughtful gift, eco-friendly home essentials, or a calming addition to their space, I’m looking for customers and partners who align with Fragrance on Flame’s mission to offer beautiful, sustainable products that enhance everyday life.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI moments was when I connected with a fellow member who had been searching for eco-friendly, high-quality gifts for their corporate clients. After introducing them to Fragrance on Flame, they ended up ordering a large batch of our candles and room sprays as part of a special gift package. It was fulfilling to see how our values aligned, and the joy in their customers’ faces when they received the thoughtful, sustainable gifts was priceless. That experience truly solidified the power of networking — not only for growing a business but for forming meaningful, lasting relationships.
